prompts.prompt: Create a job listing website with a user interface and features similar to the website https://protocol.ooo/jobs. The website should include the following functionalities and styles: 1. Job Types: - All (default selection, color: white; font-size: 14px; font-family: Inter; font-weight: 400; word-wrap: break-word) - New Graduate (color: #424242; font-size: 14px; font-family: Inter; font-weight: 400; word-wrap: break-word) - Short-term Internship (color: #424242; font-size: 14px; font-family: Inter; font-weight: 400; word-wrap: break-word) - Long-term Internship (color: #424242; font-size: 14px; font-family: Inter; font-weight: 400; word-wrap: break-word) - Event & Information Session (color: #424242; font-size: 14px; font-family: Inter; font-weight: 400; word-wrap: break-word) 2. The job types should be filterable using radio buttons on the left side of the screen. 3. On mobile screens, job types should be selectable from a dropdown button at the top of the screen.
